programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 1
programme.desc: Eric is insulted when Ridge tells him the new line lacks sex appeal. Bill tells Ridge to break up with Caroline. Brooke is attacked by two men on campus.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 2
programme.desc: Stephanie wonders if Eric is interested in Margo. Storm is furious about Brooke's attack and urges her to tell Katie and Donna.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 3
programme.desc: Thorne and Stephanie wonder if Caroline is pregnant. Beth reassures Katie about her complexion. Brooke tells Katie and Donna about her attack.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 4
programme.desc: Bill tells Margo he won't let Caroline marry Ridge. Dave tells Brooke he wants to use her as bait to catch the rapists. Brooke is worried.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 5
programme.desc: Brooke tells Dave she will act as a decoy. Dave is reluctant but agrees. Stephanie and Eric meet Bill and offer to use their home for the wedding.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 6
programme.desc: Bill pressures Margo to tell him about Ridge but she refuses. Dave proposes to Brooke but she says she'll have to think it over. Storm and Dave argue about using Brooke as a decoy.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 7
programme.desc: Kristen tells Stephanie she can't attend the wedding. Donna meets Rocco and convinces him to ask Katie out. He agrees and Katie is overjoyed.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 8
programme.desc: Stephanie suspects there is something going on between Margo and Eric. Rocco arrives for his date with Katie and is disappointed in her looks.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 9
programme.desc: Margo tells Ridge he is wrong for Caroline and she doesn't want him to hurt her. Caroline convinces Bill to give Ridge a chance. Brooke isn't ready to marry Dave.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 10
programme.desc: Eric urges Stephanie to make up with Kristen. Thorne is worried when Ridge leaves to meet Alex. Alex gets Ridge to reminisce about all the good times they had together.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 11
programme.desc: Bill tells Margo to confess all about her relationship with Ridge or drop the subject. Beth wonders if Eric remembers her. Ridge is worried about Conway�s picture.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 12
programme.desc: Brooke tells Storm how much she envies Caroline's wedding. Alex approaches Ridge again but he tells her he only loves Caroline.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 13
programme.desc: Bill is furious when he sees the picture of Ridge and Alex. Bill shows the picture to Margo and tells her he doesn't know what to do.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 14
programme.desc: Beth tells Brooke she knew Eric in college. Dave and Brooke have a romantic dinner. Brooke is angry when Dave admits Storm talked him out of the decoy plan.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 15
programme.desc: Donna realizes Katie is upset that Rocco hasn't called her and convinces him to ask her out again. Bill confronts Ridge with the picture.

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 18
programme.desc: Ridge tells Thorne he talked to Bill and hopes Bill won't tell Caroline about Alex. Caroline is thrilled about the wedding.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 19

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 20
programme.desc: Caroline is taken to the hospital. The doctor announces she is in shock and needs to be kept overnight. Ridge is devastated to think Bill told Caroline the truth.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 21
programme.desc: Brooke acts as a decoy but the plan traps the wrong men. Brooke and Donna decide to go to the hospital to get in on the excitement surrounding Caroline.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 22
programme.desc: Eric asks Kristen to stay in town but she refuses because of Stephanie's jealousy. Thorne begs Caroline to give Ridge another chance.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 23

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 24
programme.desc: Caroline leaves. Ridge comes to talk to her and is devastated to find her gone. Bill and Ridge wonder where she went. Ridge admits the wedding is cancelled.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 25
programme.desc: Storm and Alex have a date. Dave gives Brooke an engagement ring. Katie and Donna make dinner for Rocco. Rocco tries to kiss Donna when Katie leaves the room.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 26
programme.desc: Brooke shows her family her engagement ring. Everyone is thrilled. Rocco asks Katie about her acne and she is mortified.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 27
programme.desc: Caroline has her purse stolen and asks Kristen for a loan. Stephanie tells Kristen she wants her to stay in town but Kristen doesn't believe her.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 28
programme.desc: Kristen gives Caroline money and offers to stay, but Caroline refuses. Ridge suspects Kristen was with Caroline, but she lies. Margo confronts Ridge about Caroline.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 29
programme.desc: Ridge tells Caroline he loves her and will never hurt her again. She tells him she can't go back to him but he promises her that one day they will marry.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 30
programme.desc: Stephanie tries to convince Kristen to stay in Los Angeles. Bill is upset when the police return Caroline's purse to him.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 31

programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 32
programme.desc: Grandma Logan tells Beth Steven knew about Beth's love for Eric. Kristen tells Thorne where he can find Caroline.
